countingOnes.cpp

00062 #include "EALib/Population.h"
00063 
00064 //=======================================================================
00065 //
00066 // fitness function: counting ones problem
00067 //
00068 double ones( const std::vector< bool >& x )
00069 {
00070     unsigned i;
00071     double   sum;
00072     for( sum = 0., i = 0; i < x.size( ); sum += x[ i++ ] );
00073     return sum;
00074 }
00075 
00076 //=======================================================================
00077 //
00078 // main program
00079 //
00080 int main( int argc, char **argv )
00081 {
00082     //
00083     // constants
00084     //
00085     const unsigned PopSize     = 20;
00086     const unsigned Dimension   = 200;
00087     const unsigned Iterations  = 1000;
00088     const unsigned Interval    = 10;
00089     const unsigned NElitists   = 1;
00090     const unsigned Omega       = 5;
00091     const unsigned CrossPoints = 2;
00092     const double   CrossProb   = 0.6;
00093     const double   FlipProb    = 1. / Dimension;
00094 
00095     unsigned i, t;
00096 
00097     //
00098     // initialize random number generator
00099     //
00100     Rng::seed( argc > 1 ? atoi( argv[ 1 ] ) : 1234 );
00101 
00102     //
00103     // define populations
00104     //
00105     Population parents   ( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension ) );
00106     Population offsprings( PopSize, ChromosomeT< bool >( Dimension ) );
00107 
00108     //
00109     // scaling window
00110     //
00111     std::vector< double > window( Omega );
00112 
00113     //
00114     // maximization task
00115     //
00116     parents   .setMaximize( );
00117     offsprings.setMaximize( );
00118 
00119     //
00120     // initialize all chromosomes of parent population
00121     //
00122     for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00123         dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ).initialize( );
00124 
00125     //
00126     // evaluate parents (only needed for elitist strategy)
00127     //
00128     if( NElitists > 0 )
00129         for( i = 0; i < parents.size( ); ++i )
00130             parents[ i ].setFitness( ones( dynamic_cast< std::vector< bool >& >( parents[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00131 
00132     //
00133     // iterate
00134     //
00135     for( t = 0; t < Iterations; ++t ) {
00136         //
00137         // recombine by crossing over two parents
00138         //
00139         offsprings = parents;
00140         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( )-1; i += 2 )
00141             if( Rng::coinToss( CrossProb ) )
00142                 offsprings[ i ][ 0 ].crossover( offsprings[ i+1 ][ 0 ],
00143                                                 CrossPoints );
00144 
00145         //
00146         // mutate by flipping bits
00147         //
00148         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00149             dynamic_cast< ChromosomeT< bool >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ).flip( FlipProb );
00150 
00151         //
00152         // evaluate objective function
00153         //
00154         for( i = 0; i < offsprings.size( ); ++i )
00155             offsprings[ i ].setFitness( ones( dynamic_cast< std::vector< bool >& >( offsprings[ i ][ 0 ] ) ) );
00156 
00157         //
00158         // scale fitness values and use proportional selection
00159         //
00160         offsprings.linearDynamicScaling( window, t );
00161         parents.selectProportional( offsprings, NElitists );
00162 
00163         //
00164         // print out best value found so far
00165         //
00166         if( t % Interval == 0 )
00167             std::cout << t << "\tbest value = "
00168                  << parents.best( ).fitnessValue( ) << "\n";
00169     }
00170 
00171     return 0;
00172 }
